# CHSAMI Developer Blog

## Author
Sami - Software Developer

## Topics Covered
- AI agent development (Claude, GPT, Gemini, Grok)
- Autonomous development loops and automation

- Markdown-based AI instructions (AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md, CURSOR.md)
- Development frameworks and methodologies
- Claude Code CLI tools and workflows

#### Claude Code Task Management - JSON-Based Task Tracking
- URL: /posts/claude-code-task-management.html
- Published: 2026-01-27
- Description: Claude Code introduces a sophisticated task management system inspired by Beads. JSON-based task tracking with complex dependencies, parallel sub-agents, and version control integration. Covers task structure, lifecycle, context optimization, and comparison with Ralph Wiggum Loop philosophy.

#### Claude Integration Options: CLI, API, SDK, and Azure Foundry
- URL: /posts/claude-integration-options.html
- Published: 2026-01-18
- Description: A comprehensive guide for .NET developers comparing Claude Code CLI, Anthropic API, official SDKs including C#, and Azure AI Foundry integration. Covers API keys vs auth tokens, comparison matrices, and when to use each integration method.

#### Claude Reflect - Self-Learning Memory for Claude Code
- URL: /posts/claude-reflect.html
- Published: 2026-01-06
- Description: A self-learning system for Claude Code that captures your corrections, positive feedback, and preferences during coding sessions. Automatically queues learnings and syncs them to CLAUDE.md and AGENTS.md. Features hybrid detection (regex + semantic AI), multi-target sync, historical scan, and semantic deduplication.

#### Porterminal - Web-Based Terminal Access
- URL: /posts/porterminal.html
- Published: 2026-01-06
- Description: A web-based terminal that facilitates secure tunneling between your phone and PC. Just run uvx ptn and you're in — no installation, no configuration required.

#### Claude HUD - Real-Time Session Visibility
- URL: /posts/claude-hud.html
- Published: 2026-01-06
- Description: A Claude Code plugin that shows what's happening — context usage, active tools, running agents, and todo progress. Always visible below your input.

#### Claude Skills - A Complete Guide
- URL: /posts/claude-skills-guide.html
- Published: 2026-01-06
- Description: Learn how to create Claude Skills - modular instruction sets that enhance Claude's capabilities. Discover folder structure, activation logic, and best practices.

#### Ralph - Autonomous Loop for Claude Code
- URL: /posts/ralph-claude-code.html
- Published: 2026-01-01
- Description: Ralph is a bash wrapper exclusively for Claude Code that creates a continuous development loop. Define your project in PROMPT.md, let Claude iteratively build until completion. Covers loop concepts, exit detection, tmux integration, and CLI usage.

#### SpecKit - Specification-Driven Development
- URL: /posts/speckit-specification-driven-development.html
- Published: 2025-12-27
- Description: An open-source toolkit that transforms development by making specifications executable. Covers the SpecKit workflow (init, specify, plan, implement), use cases for greenfield projects and rapid prototyping, and comparison with BMAD Method.

#### How AI Agents Use Markdown Files
- URL: /posts/ai-agents-markdown.html
- Published: 2025-12-27
- Description: Comprehensive guide on why AI coding assistants rely on markdown files for project-specific instructions. Covers token efficiency, naming conventions by tool (Cursor, Claude, OpenAI Codex, GitHub Copilot, Windsurf), and file hierarchy inheritance.

#### BMAD Method - AI Development Framework
- URL: /posts/bmad-infographic.html
- Published: 2025-12-27
- Description: BMAD (Breakthrough Method for Agile AI-Driven Development) framework infographic. Covers two core phases (Agentic Planning and Context-Engineered Development), specialized AI agent roles (Analyst, PM, Architect, UX, Scrum Master, Developer, QA, Product Owner), and development workflow.
